C

canAddReview(Conference, String, String) - Method in class controller.Controller
A method that is called to see if the number of reviews on a paper is less than MAX_NUMBER_OF_REVIEWS and that the current user hasn't already submitted a review for the passed in paper.
checkConferenceExists(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Checks to see if the conference currently exists in the database.
checkValidUsername(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Checks the username in the database and returns true if it is the valid username of someone already in the system.
checkValidUsernamePassword(String, String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Checks the username and password combination against the database.
controller - package controller
 
Controller - Class in controller
The Controller handle all business logic and act as an interface between the GUI and the database.
Controller() - Constructor for class controller.Controller
Constructor for the Controller.
createNewConference(Conference) - Method in class controller.Controller
Creates a new conference.
createNewPaper(Conference, String, String, String, GUIEnum.paperStatusAuthorViewable, GUIEnum.paperStatusAdminViewable) - Method in class controller.Controller
This method adds a new paper to database as long as MAX_NUMBER_USER_SUBMITTED_PAPERS hasn't been reached.
createNewReview(String, Conference, String, String, String, int[], String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Creates a new review in the database.
